note:
Hi, I'm Aaron Parecki, Senior Security Architect at Okta, and co-founder of
IndieWebCamp.
I maintain oauth.net, write and consult about OAuth, and
participate in the OAuth Working Group at the IETF. I also help people learn about video production and livestreaming and dabble in product design.

I've been tracking my location since 2008 and I wrote 100 songs in 100 days.
I've spoken at conferences around the world about
owning your data,
OAuth,
quantified self,
and explained why R is a vowel. Read more.
name: Aaron Parecki

any earnest discussion about what Twitter™ should do just feels pointless now

content.html:
soooo ActivityPub, can we talk?

I ran some stats on the types of messages my single-user instance has received in its lifetime:

Create: 257,378
Announce (boosts, whatev): 39,168
Like: 16,723

These all seem normal.

Delete: 386,953 🤯

Why have I received more Delete activities than all other messages combined??
content.value: soooo ActivityPub, can we talk?  I ran some stats on the types of messages my single-user instance has received in its lifetime:  Create: 257,378 Announce (boosts, whatev): 39,168 Like: 16,723  These all seem normal.  Delete: 386,953 🤯  Why have I received more Delete activities than all other messages combined??

content.html: 👏👏 well played, tumblr 👏👏

I've been here 3 days and my @FitBit watch still hasn't figure out that I'm in a new time zone. What good is a watch if it can't tell you the time?? Also there's no way to manually set the timezone. And force syncing it hasn't helped either 🤨

content.html:
This morning I noticed I have a new feature in YouTube called "Go Live Together", an easy way to bring in guests to your livestream. So what better way to test it out than to try it LIVE right now?

Join me and @PhotoJoseph over here in 20 minutes!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=93xaRo4yhnE

content.html:
The new Sony ZV-1F is a pretty affordable camera that's a great option for using as a dedicated livestreaming camera!

It has clean HDMI out, good autofocus, and importantly, they moved the tripod screw out of the way of the battery door! Check out my latest video for a comparison between the ZV-1 and ZV-1F for livestreaming!

https://youtu.be/ploRr1QmCnM
content.value: The new Sony ZV-1F is a pretty affordable camera that's a great option for using as a dedicated livestreaming camera!  It has clean HDMI out, good autofocus, and importantly, they moved the tripod screw out of the way of the battery door! Check out my latest video for a comparison between the ZV-1 and ZV-1F for livestreaming!  https://youtu.be/ploRr1QmCnM
